definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

Youhao district of Yichun city 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang

sentences.english: I grant that yours are of better quality.
sentences.chinese: 我授與你的是有較好的質量。

sentences.english: Bll the boys laughed to hear the good news.
sentences.chinese: 聽見這個好動靜然後，所有的男孩都笑了。

sentences.english: After the meeting, I will you, I very well.
sentences.chinese: 經年相遇，我會對你說，我很好。

sentences.english: Rather he'll say, "It's for the child's own good.
sentences.chinese: 而是說，“這都是爲了孩子好。

sentences.english: My laundry is not ready yet.
sentences.chinese: 我送洗的衣物尚未洗好。

sentences.english: In most cases, it is a good idea to include them.
sentences.chinese: 大部分情況下，把教育時間寫進去是個好主意。

sentences.english: Again, let him get used to the fastened halter for several days.
sentences.chinese: 再次，讓他習慣了被系阿爾泰了好幾天。

sentences.english: Whole body cast, rigid, and stable performance.
sentences.chinese: 機身整體鑄造，剛性好，性能穩定。

sentences.english: They found that the higher their level of social interaction, the better their cognitive functioning.
sentences.chinese: 他們發現，社會交往越多的人認知表現越好。

sentences.english: The critical question is one of scale and degree, " said Nutt, the chairman of the government's Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs.
sentences.chinese: 關鍵問題是如何掌握好它的度和量。

sentences.english: Performance of coating plate with the special hydrophobic coating solution was better.
sentences.chinese: 採用雙疏塗層溶液塗覆的多孔板相對好一些。

sentences.english: B. That's fine. May be I should have boiled eggs.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，也許我喫水煮蛋算了。

sentences.english: LECTURER: Hello my name is Paulo D'Iorio.
sentences.chinese: 大家好，我是保羅D愛奧利歐。

sentences.english: The Nokia 1209 also has a one-piece key mat for durability and reliability.
sentences.chinese: 諾基亞1209也同樣是一款耐用和可靠的好機型。

sentences.english: The large print makes for  easier reading.
The clever thing was to break the rules and stay alive all the same .
sentences.chinese: 聰明的做法，是把規矩破得巧，同時又得活得好。

definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)

(after a verb) indicating the beginning and continuation of an action or a state/indicating an upward movement (e.g. after 站[zhan4])/indicating completion/(after a perception verb, e.g. 看[kan4]) expressing preliminary judgment/also pr. [qi3 lai5]
to stand up/to get up/also pr. [qi3 lai2]
stick/club/cudgel/smart/capable/strong/wonderful/classifier for legs of a relay race
you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
